meanings.definition: Surveying again to determine the current status or condition of something.
meanings.sent1: The team will be resurveying the land to check for any changes.
meanings.sent2: They are resurveying the area to update their records.
meanings.sent3: After resurveying the garden, they found a hidden treasure map!
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was resurveying her life after the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent5: The scientist meticulously resurveyed the data to ensure accuracy.
